product_name: Mountain House Diced Chicken - 17 oz. Can
long_description: Stock up with freeze-dried Mountain House Diced Chicken. It's handy to have around when you're prepping meals for a big adventure or setting up an emergency preparedness kit. Easy to prepare-just add hot water. Can includes fourteen 0.75-cup servings. Mountain House Diced Chicken has a 25-year shelf life. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Stock up with freeze-dried Mountain House Diced Chicken. It's handy to have around when you're prepping meals for a big adventure or setting up an emergency preparedness kit.
